html:
4.13.22  12:17 am   In "la de da de day oh", what is home?

      the end of the chorus

4.13.22  12:17 am   Bill, How do you make good music. I'm making an album, and my friend thinks it is good, but I think it sounds bad. You're one of my biggest inspirations, so it'd be cool to hear your incite.

      it's impossible to know exactly how to make music. ultimately the music has to make you. so you just have to be open to that. i know that seems weird but it's true

4.12.22  11:43 pm   I had a dream that I said something really rude to someone and they got mad at me and started a podcast ranting about how mad at me they were. What do you think it means

      it probably means you care about public relations

4.12.22  10:04 pm   I'm glad that you used the word 'meef' at the end of your last song because I finally found the perfect word to describe my cat, but I was wondering, what does it mean in your opinion?

      milk beef?

4.12.22  9:22 pm   Do you agree that D major is the worst key?

      no

4.12.22  7:49 pm   whats a good creative writing tip

      try writing something bad on purpose, even if just for a moment

4.12.22  7:45 pm   hey, if u make Livestream about you making ur videos, wouldn't that be spoiling part of it?

      yep

4.12.22  7:19 pm   What is the first letter of the title of the next song?

      a

4.12.22  7:00 pm   recently almost every chorus/prechorus idea i've been excited about has had a 4 chord under the first bar of it. |4|1|5|6m 5|, |4|6m|5|2m 1|, |4|5|3m|6m|, |4|5|6m|1|, |4|6m|3m|3m|, etc. (i come up with the melody before or at the same time as the chords, so i'm not doing anything chords-first.) i think what appeals to me is that it feels like you're near the base of a mountain, looking up at the top of the mountain. it gives you an itch to climb the mountain. being on the 4 is like having unfinished business,

     right

      so it's automatic dramatic tension for the rest of the hook to resolve. even in something like a |6m|4|1|5|, i feel like the 6m is forlorn and the 4 is what injects hope into it (noticing the top of the mountain).

the downside is i feel it's making my ideas sound too similar. like i'm making different versions of the same song each time. i would still like to make something you can dance and sing along to, and still have that dramatic tension , but what is another good way to do it without starting on the 4? do i just need to wait for my taste in melodies to change?

     rearrange the whole situation. change something even more drastic so you never have to be in that situation. Also it sounds like it's probably time for you to launch into an in-depth study of every popular song you can think of. you'll hear a lot of 4 based things, but you'll also find some other crucial things

4.12.22  6:54 pm   At 00:58 of "Might quit" when it shows some kind of character selection screen, there a specific character that caught my attencion wich is the one who is called Princess Realistic, and I've been wondering if that's a reference to "I'm a Princess" released later.

     no. the princess song was not conceived yet. But, it would be conceived probably within a short number of days or weeks later. so the relation is just that it was created by the same person in a similar time period

      Also the drawing you made for that specific character kinda looks like the princess, a little bit at least.

     that would surely be for the same reason

4.12.22  6:47 pm   how tall are you

      infinitely tall

4.12.22  6:22 pm   do you have a potato in your kitchen right now

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.12.22  6:04 pm   Are you sure the tempo of your next song is 131 and not 65.5 or 262?

      there's 12 bars in the middle that sounds like 6 bars of 65.5. The rest is confidently 131

4.12.22  5:33 pm   When will the music video for your next song release?

      next tuesday

4.12.22  4:39 pm   I remember you've experimented with just intonation before and you realized that 12TET is not merely a compromise but even has its own advantages in a single key. Have you ever experimented with other equal temperament systems though, like 19TET or 31TET?

     no

     Do you have any thoughts on those?

      no. hooked on 12 for life. also free-range is nice, so don't think i'm imprisoned in 12. i also never use any pitch correction on my voice, so in that sense i'm still free as a bird

4.12.22  4:25 pm   how do you get better at speaking? like stutter less, because I do that like way too much

      the most famous way to heal a stutter is to spend time reading scripted material. then if you practice writing also, pretty soon you'll learn to write fast enough to do both at the same time. you might end up being an even better speaker than your non-stuttering peers

4.12.22  3:33 pm   i notice that alot of the time your mixes sound quite full, but alot of the time its hard to put my hand on which elemtents make it sound full - how do you do it? / what elements do you think make it sound fuller?

      around christmas (specifically november 23, 2018) i got up the courage to use multiband compressors, to save time. also, around mid 2018 i discovered low-cutting everything except the bass and kick. that helps for cleanliness. then in late 2021 i discovered parallel compression, and that's a life changer

4.12.22  2:41 pm   will you be my friend?

      i'll try

4.12.22  2:02 pm   What's the tempo of your next song

      131

4.12.22  11:08 am   Will you ever do another non-song video?

      oh hell yeah

4.12.22  10:26 am   on a scale from "sweet" to "very spicy" what does your next song taste like musically

      pretty good

4.12.22  9:46 am   What do you think is the best song you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

4.12.22  9:20 am   what's a nice bob ross moment?

      always the mad scramble in the last 5 minutes. it's subtle, but once you know it's there you'll notice it every time

4.12.22  7:55 am   Will you include imaginary and irrational numbers  in your next song?

      i'll probably hang back on the numbers for the next one, because there were a lot of numbers in the previous one

4.12.22  3:55 am   does your next song contain the word 'goose'?

      no

4.12.22  3:40 am   How can one know when someone is lying?

      you can feel it. feels fake

4.12.22  12:45 am   techniques for finding out why I am

      start exploring some different locations

4.11.22  11:32 pm   can i write a narrative without using names

      surely

4.11.22  10:58 pm   How can I stop feeling like garbage and finally cure my writing anxiety?

      just start writing

4.11.22  10:42 pm   Is there a song that you've written in Amaj key?

      more than 1, for sure

4.11.22  9:37 pm   is Shrek a good film

      i'm sure that was the plan

4.11.22  9:22 pm   do you listen to your own songs as inspiration for new ones?

      no

4.11.22  8:35 pm   why does Garfield love lasagna so much

      that's just because the author likes it

4.11.22  7:55 pm   can i use my trumpet valve oil for eye-drops

      i doubt it

4.11.22  6:59 pm   If chords were swords, which chord do you think would be the sharpest sword? 

      chords are given their sharpness by what's happening in the rest of the song around them. any chord could be placed in a situation where it's the sharpest in the song

4.11.22  6:06 pm   is the word 'animal' in your next song or title of the song?

      no

4.11.22  5:27 pm   What would you define your song style as?

      sensible

4.11.22  5:16 pm   What keeps you up at night?

      sleeping during the day

4.11.22  4:43 pm   Is "I'm scared" supposed to perfectly encapsulate the human experience or was that just an accident?

      it's certainly a standard worth aiming for every time

4.11.22  3:46 pm   what is the first word in the song after your next song

      i have no idea

4.11.22  3:22 pm   what are your thoughts on the idea that our universe and everything therein is simulated?

      then i'd say 'simulation' and 'situation' become synonyms, and it's all good

4.11.22  2:31 pm   Chords for the song "its not christmas?"

      D  A/D  G/B  D/A  G  D/F#  Asus4 and more

4.11.22  2:15 pm   what do you think i should try to write a song about? 

      everything

4.11.22  2:09 pm   Because "ball & stick" released on New Year's Day, would you consider the song to be about New Year's Resolutions?

      it's not a song, nor is it about new years. it has song bits in it, none of which are about new years. although i suppose the song at the end could be a good new years resolution

4.11.22  1:43 pm   if I didn't ask a question would you be mad

      no

4.11.22  1:22 pm   have you been writing a book about psychology this whole time?

      writing, yes. book, no. i'm proud to say that in this past century writing has been freed from the book

4.11.22  1:05 pm   whats the first word of the upcoming song

      at

4.11.22  11:10 am   If art is the imitation of life, life is the ability to die, and life is the imitation of art, does that mean that the best art doesn't last forever, meaning that the best life doesn't last forever?

     no

      Or have I committed some sort of fallacy?

     possibly yes, or, possibly quotation. i'm not sure

4.11.22  10:25 am   is 987 a spinoff of alphabet shuffle or just the extended version (but without the original)

      no

4.11.22  9:34 am   I'm going to the store do you want anything?

      how about a brand new world
